title: Partnership Agreement Template
content: This document outlines the standard terms for partnership agreements including revenue sharing, responsibilities, and termination clauses. Partners must contribute minimum 10% effort and receive revenue based on contribution tiers.

title: Revenue Sharing Guidelines
content: Revenue sharing should be based on contribution levels: Tier 1 partners receive 30%, Tier 2 receive 20%, and Tier 3 receive 10% of net revenue. All calculations are done quarterly.

title: Partnership Compliance Requirements
content: All partnerships must comply with regulatory requirements including documentation of revenue streams, partner verification, and quarterly reporting to relevant authorities.

title: Standard Partnership Contract
content: The standard partnership contract includes terms for: intellectual property rights, liability distribution, termination procedures, and dispute resolution mechanisms.
